mapper.select: SELECT gmo.tenantId as tenantId, gmo.contNm as contNm, (CASE WHEN max(gmo.url1) is null THEN max(url2) ELSE max(url1) END) as url1, (CASE WHEN max(gmo.url2) is null THEN max(url1) ELSE max(url2) END) as url2 FROM ( SELECT mo.tenant_id as tenantId ,mo.cont_nm as contNm ,(CASE WHEN mo.montrn_fg_cd= 'SERVICE' THEN montrn_url_addr ELSE null END) as url1 ,(CASE WHEN mo.montrn_fg_cd= 'FLOW' THEN montrn_url_addr ELSE null END) as url2 FROM ( SELECT b.tenant_id,a.cont_nm, b.montrn_fg_cd, b.montrn_url_addr FROM concustcontm a, concustcontmontrnm b WHERE a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id ) mo ) gmo GROUP BY tenantId,contNm

SELECT gmo.tenantId as tenantId, gmo.contNm as contNm, (CASE WHEN max(gmo.url1) is null THEN max(url2) ELSE max(url1) END) as url1, (CASE WHEN max(gmo.url2) is null THEN max(url1) ELSE max(url2) END) as url2 FROM ( SELECT mo.tenant_id as tenantId ,mo.cont_nm as contNm ,(CASE WHEN mo.montrn_fg_cd= 'SERVICE' THEN montrn_url_addr ELSE null END) as url1 ,(CASE WHEN mo.montrn_fg_cd= 'FLOW' THEN montrn_url_addr ELSE null END) as url2 FROM ( SELECT b.tenant_id,a.cont_nm, b.montrn_fg_cd, b.montrn_url_addr FROM concustcontm a, concustcontmontrnm b WHERE a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id ) mo where mo.tenant_id=#{tenantId} ) gmo GROUP BY tenantId,contNm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO concustcontmontrnm( tenant_id, montrn_fg_cd, montrn_url_addr, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{montrnFgCd}, #{montrnUrlAddr}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp )
mapper.update: UPDATE concustcontmontrnm SET montrn_url_addr = #{montrnUrlAddr}, udt_id = #{udtId}, udt_ip = #{udtIp}, udt_date = current_timestamp WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND montrn_fg_cd = #{montrnFgCd}
